item.title: GM
item.description: score:320 Chances: General Motors’ Cruise autonomous driving business is preparing to resume testing its robotaxis with safety drivers in Phoenix, marking an important step in its attempts to restart service after grounding its fleet last year. GM is entering the EV truck business with a splash.
